QuestData.Title: On The Prowl
QuestData.Description: I have heard report of a great white beast that stalks the wood on the northwestern side of the wild serpent island.$B$BThis savage creature is mate to the Windward Huntress, and already he has taken down several of the adult cloud serpent matriarchs.$B$BWe cannot have such a fearsome predator roaming the island unchecked.$B$BGo and deal with this creature. Let us see if your training has paid off.
